words.translation: Saad|By the Quran|full (of) reminder|full (of) reminder

translations.1: Saaad; wal-Qur-aani ziz zikr
translations.2: Sad waalqurani thee alththikri

words.translation: Nay|those who|disbelieve|(are) in|self-glory|and opposition

translations.1: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee 'izzatinw Wa-shiqaaq
translations.2: Bali allatheena kafaroo fee AAizzatin washiqaqin

words.translation: How many|We destroyed|before them|before them|of|a generation|then they called out|when there (was) no longer|time|(for) escape

translations.1: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw Wa-laata heena manaas
translations.2: Kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin fanadaw walata heena manasin

words.translation: And they wonder|that|has come to them|a warner|from among themselves|And said|the disbelievers|This|(is) a magician|a liar

translations.1: Wa-'ajibooo an jaaa'a-hum munzirum minhum Wa-qaalal kaafiroona haazaa saahirun kazzaab
translations.2: WaAAajiboo an jaahum munthirun minhum waqala alkafiroona hatha sahirun kaththabun

words.translation: Has he made|the gods|(into) one god|(into) one god|Indeed|this|(is) certainly a thing|curious

translations.1: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw Waahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab
translations.2: AjaAAala alalihata ilahan wahidan inna hatha lashayon AAujabun

words.translation: And went forth|the chiefs|among them|that|Continue|and be patient|over|your gods|Indeed|this|(is) certainly a thing|intended

translations.1: Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna haazaa lashai-'uien yuraad
translations.2: Waintalaqa almalao minhum ani imshoo waisbiroo AAala alihatikum inna hatha lashayon yuradu

words.translation: Not|we heard|of this|in|the religion|the last|Not|(is) this|but|a fabrication

translations.1: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq
translations.2: Ma samiAAna bihatha fee almillati alakhirati in hatha illa ikhtilaqun

words.translation: Has been revealed|to him|the Message|from|among us|Nay|They|(are) in|doubt|about|My Message|Nay|not|they have tasted|My punishment

translations.1: A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru min baininaa; bal hum fee shakkin min Zikree bal lammaa yazooqoo 'azaab
translations.2: Aonzila AAalayhi alththikru min baynina bal hum fee shakkin min thikree bal lamma yathooqoo AAathabi

words.translation: Or|have they|(the) treasures|(of the) Mercy|(of) your Lord|the All-Mighty|the Bestower

translations.1: Am'indahum khazaaa 'inu rahmati Rabbikal 'Azeezil Wahhab
translations.2: Am AAindahum khazainu rahmati rabbika alAAazeezi alwahhabi

words.translation: Or|for them|(is the) dominion|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|Then let them ascend|by|the means

translations.1: Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil asbaab
translations.2: Am lahum mulku alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma falyartaqoo fee alasbabi

words.translation: Soldiers|there|there|(they will be) defeated|among|the companies

translations.1: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab
translations.2: Jundun ma hunalika mahzoomun mina alahzabi

words.translation: Denied|before them|(the) people|(of) Nuh|and Aad|and Firaun|(the) owner|(of) the stakes

translations.1: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw Wa-'Aadunw Wa-Fir'awnu zul awtaad
translations.2: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohin waAAadun wafirAAawnu thoo alawtadi

words.translation: And Thamud|and (the) people|(of) Lut|and (the) companions|(of) the wood|Those|(were) the companies

translations.1: Wa-Samoodu Wa-qawmu Lootinw Wa-As-haabul 'Aykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab
translations.2: Wathamoodu waqawmu lootin waashabu alaykati olaika alahzabu

words.translation: Not|all (of them)|but|denied|the Messengers|so was just|My penalty

translations.1: In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab
translations.2: In kullun illa kaththaba alrrusula fahaqqa AAiqabi

words.translation: And not|await|these|but|a shout|one|not|for it|any|delay

translations.1: Wa-maa yanzuru haaa-ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min fawaaq
translations.2: Wama yanthuru haolai illa sayhatan wahidatan ma laha min fawaqin

words.translation: And they say|Our Lord!|Hasten|for us|our share|before|(the) Day|(of) the Account

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab
translations.2: Waqaloo rabbana AAajjil lana qittana qabla yawmi alhisabi

words.translation: Be patient|over|what|they say|and remember|Our slave|Dawood|the possessor of strength|the possessor of strength|Indeed, he (was)|repeatedly turning

translations.1: Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi innahooo awwaab
translations.2: Isbir AAala ma yaqooloona waothkur AAabdana dawooda tha alaydi innahu awwabun

words.translation: Indeed We|subjected|the mountains|with him|glorifying|in the evening|and [the] sunrise

translations.1: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashiyyi wal-ishraaq
translations.2: Inna sakhkharna aljibala maAAahu yusabbihna bialAAashiyyi waalishraqi

words.translation: And the birds|assembled|all|with him|repeatedly turning

translations.1: Wattayra mahshoorah; kullul lahooo awwaab
translations.2: Waalttayra mahshooratan kullun lahu awwabun

words.translation: And We strengthened|his kingdom|and We gave him|[the] wisdom|and decisive|speech

translations.1: Wa-shadadnaa mulkahoo Wa-aatainaahul Hikmata Wa-faslal khitaab
translations.2: Washadadna mulkahu waataynahu alhikmata wafasla alkhitabi

words.translation: And has (there)|come to you|(the) news|(of) the litigants|when|they climbed over the wall|(of) the chamber

translations.1: Wa-hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab
translations.2: Wahal ataka nabao alkhasmi ith tasawwaroo almihraba

words.translation: When|they entered|upon|Dawood|and he was afraid|of them|they said|(Do) not|fear|(We are) two litigants|has wronged|one of us|to|another|so judge|between us|in truth|and (do) not|be unjust|and guide us|to|an even|[the] path

translations.1: Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo laa takhaf khasmaani baghaa ba'dunaa 'alaa ba'din fahkum bainanaaa bilhaqqi Wa-laa tushtit wahdinaaa ilaa Sawaaa'is Siraat
translations.2: Ith dakhaloo AAala dawooda fafaziAAa minhum qaloo la takhaf khasmani bagha baAAduna AAala baAAdin faohkum baynana bialhaqqi wala tushtit waihdina ila sawai alssirati

words.translation: Indeed|this|(is) my brother|he has|ninety-nine|ninety-nine|ewe(s)|while I have|ewe|one|so he said|Entrust her to me|and he overpowered me|in|[the] speech

translations.1: Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw Wa-tis'oona na'jatanw Wa-liya na'jatunw waahidah; faqaala akfilneeha Wa-'azzanee fil khitaab
translations.2: Inna hatha akhee lahu tisAAun watisAAoona naAAjatan waliya naAAjatun wahidatun faqala akfilneeha waAAazzanee fee alkhitabi

words.translation: He said|Certainly|he has wronged you|by demanding|your ewe|to|his ewes|And indeed|many|of|the partners|certainly oppress|one|[on]|another|except|those who|believe|and do|righteous deeds|and few|(are) they|(are) they|And became certain|Dawood|that|We (had) tried him|and he asked forgiveness|(of) his Lord|and fell down|bowing|and turned in repentance

translations.1: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu-'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajih; Wa-inna kaseeran minal khulataaa'i la-yabghee ba'duhum 'alaa ba'din illal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati Wa-qaleelun maa hum; Wa-zanna Daawoodu annamaa fatannaahu fastaghfara Rabbahoo Wa-kharra raaki'anw Wa-anaab
translations.2: Qala laqad thalamaka bisuali naAAjatika ila niAAajihi wainna katheeran mina alkhulatai layabghee baAAduhum AAala baAAdin illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati waqaleelun ma hum wathanna dawoodu annama fatannahu faistaghfara rabbahu wakharra rakiAAan waanaba

words.translation: So We forgave|for him|that|And indeed|for him|with Us|surely is a near access|and a good|place of return

translations.1: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; Wa-inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa Wa-husna ma-aab
translations.2: Faghafarna lahu thalika wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin

words.translation: O Dawood!|Indeed We|[We] have made you|a vicegerent|in|the earth|so judge|between|[the] men|in truth|and (do) not|follow|the desire|for it will lead you stray|from|(the) way|(of) Allah|Indeed|those who|go astray|from|(the) way|(of) Allah|for them|(is) a punishment|severe|because|they forgot|(the) Day|(of) Account

translations.1: Yaa-Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi Wa-laa tattabi'il hawaa fayudillaka 'an sabeelil laah; innal lazeena yadilloona 'an sabeelil laah; lahum 'azaabun shadeedum bimaa nasoo Yawmal Hisaab
translations.2: Ya dawoodu inna jaAAalnaka khaleefatan fee alardi faohkum bayna alnnasi bialhaqqi wala tattabiAAi alhawa fayudillaka AAan sabeeli Allahi inna allatheena yadilloona AAan sabeeli Allahi lahum AAathabun shadeedun bima nasoo yawma alhisabi

words.translation: And not|We created|the heaven|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|without purpose|That|(is the) assumption|(of) those who|disbelieve|So woe|to those|who disbelieve|from|the Fire

translations.1: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena kafaroo; fa-waylul lil-lazeena kafaroo minan Naar
translations.2: Wama khalaqna alssamaa waalarda wama baynahuma batilan thalika thannu allatheena kafaroo fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo mina alnnari

words.translation: Or|should We treat|those who|believe|and do|righteous deeds|like those who spread corruption|in|the earth|Or|should We treat|the pious|like the wicked

translations.1: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena kalfujjaar
translations.2: Am najAAalu allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati kaalmufsideena fee alardi am najAAalu almuttaqeena kaalfujjari

words.translation: (This is) a Book|We have revealed it|to you|blessed|that they may ponder|(over) its Verses|and may be reminded|those of understanding|those of understanding

translations.1: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee Wa-liyatazakkara ulul albaab
translations.2: Kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaroo ayatihi waliyatathakkara oloo alalbabi

words.translation: And We gave|to Dawood|Sulaiman|an excellent|slave|Indeed he|was one who repeatedly turned

translations.1: Wa-wahabnaa li-Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab
translations.2: Wawahabna lidawooda sulaymana niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun

words.translation: When|were displayed|to him|in the afternoon|excellent bred steeds|excellent bred steeds

translations.1: Iz 'urida 'alaihi bil'ashiy-yis saafinaatul jiyaad
translations.2: Ith AAurida AAalayhi bialAAashiyyi alssafinatu aljiyadu

words.translation: And he said|Indeed I|[I] preferred|(the) love|(of) the good|for|(the) remembrance|(of) my Lord|Until|they were hidden|in the veil

translations.1: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab
translations.2: Faqala innee ahbabtu hubba alkhayri AAan thikri rabbee hatta tawarat bialhijabi

words.translation: Return them|to me|Then he began|to pass (his hand)|over the legs|and the necks

translations.1: Ruddoohaa 'alaiya fa-tafiqa mas-ham bissooqi wal-a'naaq
translations.2: Ruddooha AAalayya fatafiqa mashan bialssooqi waalaAAnaqi

words.translation: And certainly|We tried|Sulaiman|and We placed|on|his throne|a body|then|he turned

translations.1: Wa-laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana Wa-alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab
translations.2: Walaqad fatanna sulaymana waalqayna AAala kursiyyihi jasadan thumma anaba

words.translation: He said|O my Lord|Forgive|me|and grant|me|a kingdom|not|(will) belong|to anyone|after me|after me|Indeed, You|[You]|(are) the Bestower

translations.1: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee Wa-hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li-ahadin min ba'dee innaka Antal Wahhaab
translations.2: Qala rabbi ighfir lee wahab lee mulkan la yanbaghee liahadin min baAAdee innaka anta alwahhabu

words.translation: Then We subjected|to him|the wind|to flow|by his command|gently|wherever|he directed

translations.1: Fa-sakharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi-amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab
translations.2: Fasakhkharna lahu alrreeha tajree biamrihi rukhaan haythu asaba

words.translation: And the devils|every|builder|and diver

translations.1: Wash-Shayaateena kulla bannaaa'inw Wa-ghawwaas
translations.2: Waalshshayateena kulla bannain waghawwasin

words.translation: And others|bound|in|chains

translations.1: Wa-aakhareena muqarraneena fil asfaad
translations.2: Waakhareena muqarraneena fee alasfadi

words.translation: This|(is) Our gift|so grant|or|withhold|without|account

translations.1: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab
translations.2: Hatha AAataona faomnun aw amsik bighayri hisabin

words.translation: And indeed|for him|with Us|surely is a near access|and a good|place of return

translations.1: Wa-inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa Wa-husna ma-aab
translations.2: Wainna lahu AAindana lazulfa wahusna maabin

words.translation: And remember|Our slave|Ayyub|when|he called|his Lord|That [I]|has touched me|Shaitaan|with distress|and suffering

translations.1: Wazkur 'abdanaaa Ayyoob; iz naada Rabbahooo annee massaniyash Shaitaanu bi-nusbinw Wa-'azaab
translations.2: Waothkur AAabdana ayyooba ith nada rabbahu annee massaniya alshshaytanu binusbin waAAathabin

words.translation: Strike|with your foot|This|(is a spring) of water to bathe|cool|and a drink

translations.1: Urkud bi-rijlika haaza mughtasalun baaridunw Wa-sharaab
translations.2: Orkud birijlika hatha mughtasalun baridun washarabun

words.translation: And We granted|[to] him|his family|and a like of them|with them|a Mercy|from Us|and a Reminder|for those of understanding|for those of understanding

translations.1: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo ahlahoo Wa-mislahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna Wa-zikraa li-ulil albaab
translations.2: Wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan minna wathikra liolee alalbabi

words.translation: And take|in your hand|a bunch|and strike|with it|and (do) not|break (your) oath|Indeed We|[We] found him|patient|an excellent|slave|Indeed he|repeatedly turned

translations.1: Wa-khuz biyadika dighsan fadrib bihee Wa-laa tahnas, innaa wajadnaahu saabiraa; ni'mal 'abd; innahooo awwaab
translations.2: Wakhuth biyadika dighthan faidrib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran niAAma alAAabdu innahu awwabun

words.translation: And remember|Our slaves|Ibrahim|and Ishaq|and Ayyub,|possessors|(of) strength|and vision

translations.1: Wazkur 'ibaadanaaa Ibraaheema Wa-Is-haaqa Wa-Ya'qooba ulil aydee walabsaar
translations.2: Waothkur AAibadana ibraheema waishaqa wayaAAqooba olee alaydee waalabsari

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] chose them|for an exclusive (quality)|remembrance|(of) the Home

translations.1: Innaaa akhlasnaahum bi-khaalisatin zikrad daar
translations.2: Inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin thikra alddari

words.translation: And indeed they|to Us|(are) from|the chosen ones|the best

translations.1: Wa-innahum 'indanaa laminal mustafainal akhyaar
translations.2: Wainnahum AAindana lamina almustafayna alakhyari

words.translation: And remember|Ismail|and Al-Yasa|and Dhul-kifl|and Dhul-kifl|and all|(are) from|the best

translations.1: Wazkur Ismaa'eela wal Yasa'a Wa-Zal-Kifli Wa-kullun minal akhyaar
translations.2: Waothkur ismaAAeela wailyasaAAa watha alkifli wakullun mina alakhyari

words.translation: This|(is) a Reminder|And indeed|for the righteous|surely is a good|place of return

translations.1: Haazaa zikrun Wa-inna lil-muttaqeena la-husna ma-aab
translations.2: Hatha thikrun wainna lilmuttaqeena lahusna maabin

words.translation: Gardens|(of) Eternity|(will be) opened|for them|the gates

translations.1: Jannaati 'adnin mufattahatan lahumul abwaab
translations.2: Jannati AAadnin mufattahatan lahumu alabwabu

words.translation: Reclining|therein|they will call|therein|for fruit|many|and drink

translations.1: Muttaki'eena feehaa yad'oona feehaa bifaakihatin kaseeratinw Wa-sharaab
translations.2: Muttakieena feeha yadAAoona feeha bifakihatin katheeratin washarabin

words.translation: And with them|(will be) companions of modest gaze|(will be) companions of modest gaze|well-matched

translations.1: Wa-'indahum qaasiraatut tarfi atraab
translations.2: WaAAindahum qasiratu alttarfi atrabun

words.translation: This|(is) what|you are promised|for (the) Day|(of) Account

translations.1: Haazaa maa too'adoona li-Yawmil Hisaab
translations.2: Hatha ma tooAAadoona liyawmi alhisabi

words.translation: Indeed|this|(is) surely Our provision|not|for it|any|depletion

translations.1: Inna haazaa larizqunaa maa lahoo min nafaad
translations.2: Inna hatha larizquna ma lahu min nafadin

words.translation: This (is so)!|And indeed|for the transgressors|surely (is) an evil|place of return

translations.1: Haazaa; Wa-inna littaagheena lasharra ma-aab
translations.2: Hatha wainna lilttagheena lasharra maabin

words.translation: Hell|they will burn therein|and wretched is|the resting place

translations.1: Jahannama yaslawnahaa fa-bi'sal mihaad
translations.2: Jahannama yaslawnaha fabisa almihadu

words.translation: This (is so)!|Then let them taste it|boiling fluid|and purulence

translations.1: Haazaa falyazooqoohu hameemunw Wa-ghassaaq
translations.2: Hatha falyathooqoohu hameemun waghassaqun

words.translation: And other|of|its type|(of various) kinds

translations.1: Wa-aakharu min shakliheee azwaaj
translations.2: Waakharu min shaklihi azwajun

words.translation: This|(is) a company|bursting in|with you|No|welcome|for them|Indeed they|(will) burn|(in) the Fire

translations.1: Haazaa fawjun muqtahimun ma'akum laa marhaban bihim; innahum saalun Naar
translations.2: Hatha fawjun muqtahimun maAAakum la marhaban bihim innahum saloo alnnari

words.translation: They say|Nay!|You|no|welcome|for you|You|brought this|upon us|So wretched is|the settlement

translations.1: Qaaloo bal antum laa marhaban bikum; antum qaddamtumoohu lanaa fabi'sal qaraar
translations.2: Qaloo bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumoohu lana fabisa alqararu

words.translation: They will say|Our Lord|whoever|brought|upon us|this|increase for him|a punishment|double|in|the Fire

translations.1: Qaaloo Rabbanaa man qaddama lanaa haazaa fa-zidhu 'azaaban di'fan fin Naar
translations.2: Qaloo rabbana man qaddama lana hatha fazidhu AAathaban diAAfan fee alnnari

words.translation: And they will say|What (is)|for us|not|we see|men|we used (to)|count them|among|the bad ones

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo maa lanaa laa naraa rijaalan kunnaa na'udduhum minal ashraar
translations.2: Waqaloo ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naAAudduhum mina alashrari

words.translation: Did we take them|(in) ridicule|or|has turned away|from them|the vision

translations.1: Attakhaznaahum sikh-riyyan am zaaghat 'anhumul absaar
translations.2: Attakhathnahum sikhriyyan am zaghat AAanhumu alabsaru

words.translation: Indeed|that|(is) surely (the) truth|(the) quarreling|(of the) people|(of) the Fire

translations.1: Inna zaalika lahaqqun takhaasumu Ahlin Naar
translations.2: Inna thalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli alnnari

words.translation: Say|Only|I am|a warner|and not|(is there) any|god|except|Allah|the One|the Irresistible

translations.1: Qul innamaaa ana munzirunw Wa-maa min laahin illal laahul Waahidul Qahhaar
translations.2: Qul innama ana munthirun wama min ilahin illa Allahu alwahidu alqahharu

words.translation: Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|the All-Mighty|the Oft-Forgiving

translations.1: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar
translations.2: Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma alAAazeezu alghaffaru

words.translation: Say|It (is)|a news|great

translations.1: Qul huwa naba'un 'azeem
translations.2: Qul huwa nabaon AAatheemun

words.translation: You|from it|turn away

translations.1: Antum 'anhu mu'ridoon
translations.2: Antum AAanhu muAAridoona

words.translation: Not|is|for me|any|knowledge|(of) the chiefs|the exalted|when|they were disputing

translations.1: Maa kaana liya min 'ilmin bil-mala'il a'laaa iz yakhtasimoon
translations.2: Ma kana liya min AAilmin bialmalai alaAAla ith yakhtasimoona

words.translation: Not|has been revealed|to me|except|that only|I am|a warner|clear

translations.1: Ien-yoohaaa ilaiya illaaa anna maaa ana nazeerun mubeen
translations.2: In yooha ilayya illa annama ana natheerun mubeenun

words.translation: When|said|your Lord|to the Angels|Indeed I Am|going to create|a human being|from|clay

translations.1: Iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'ikati innee khaaliqun basharan min teen
translations.2: Ith qala rabbuka lilmalaikati innee khaliqun basharan min teenin

words.translation: So when|I have proportioned him|and breathed|into him|of|My spirit|then fall down|to him|prostrating

translations.1: Fa-iza sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
translations.2: Faitha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehi min roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideena

words.translation: So prostrated|the Angels|all of them|together

translations.1: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon
translations.2: Fasajada almalaikatu kulluhum ajmaAAoona

words.translation: Except|Iblis|he was arrogant|and became|of|the disbelievers

translations.1: Illaaa Iblees; stakbara Wa-kaana minal kaafireen
translations.2: Illa ibleesa istakbara wakana mina alkafireena

words.translation: He said|O Iblis!|What|prevented you|that|you (should) prostrate|to (one) whom|I created|with My Hands|Are you arrogant|or|are you|of|the exalted ones

translations.1: Qaala yaaa-Ibleesu maa mana'aka an tasjuda limaa khalaqtu bi-yadaiyya-'a stakbarta am kunta min al-'aaleen
translations.2: Qala ya ibleesu ma manaAAaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina alAAaleena

words.translation: He said|I am|better|than him|You created me|from|fire|and You created him|from|clay

translations.1: Qaala ana khairum minhu; khalaqtanee min naarinw Wa-khalaqtahoo min teen
translations.2: Qala ana khayrun minhu khalaqtanee min narin wakhalaqtahu min teenin

words.translation: He said|Then get out|of it|for indeed you|(are) accursed

translations.1: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa-innaka rajeem
translations.2: Qala faokhruj minha fainnaka rajeemun

words.translation: And indeed|upon you|(is) My curse|until|(the) Day|(of) Judgment

translations.1: Wa-inna 'alaika la'nateee ilaa Yawmid Deen
translations.2: Wainna AAalayka laAAnatee ila yawmi alddeeni

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Then give me respite|until|(the) Day|they are resurrected

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
translations.2: Qala rabbi faanthirnee ila yawmi yubAAathoona

words.translation: He said|Then indeed you|(are) of|those given respite

translations.1: Qaala fa-innaka minal munzareen
translations.2: Qala fainnaka mina almunthareena

words.translation: Until|(the) Day|(of) the time|well-known

translations.1: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
translations.2: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloomi

words.translation: He said|Then by Your might|I will surely mislead them|all

translations.1: Qaala fa-bi-'izzatika la-ughwiyannahum ajma'een
translations.2: Qala fabiAAizzatika laoghwiyannahum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: Except|Your slaves|among them|the chosen ones

translations.1: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
translations.2: Illa AAibadaka minhumu almukhlaseena

words.translation: He said|Then (it is) the truth|and the truth|I say

translations.1: Qaala falhaqq, walhaqqa aqool
translations.2: Qala faalhaqqu waalhaqqa aqoolu

words.translation: Surely I will fill|Hell|with you|and those who|follow you|among them|all

translations.1: La-amla'anna Jahannama minka Wa-mimman tabi'aka minhum ajma'een
translations.2: Laamlaanna jahannama minka wamimman tabiAAaka minhum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: Say|Not|I ask of you|for it|any|payment|and not|I am|of|the ones who pretend

translations.1: Qul maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrinw Wa-maaa ana minal mutakallifeen
translations.2: Qul ma asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina almutakallifeena

words.translation: Not|it (is)|except|a Reminder|to the worlds

translations.1: In huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
translations.2: In huwa illa thikrun lilAAalameena

words.translation: And surely you will know|its information|after|a time

translations.1: Wa-lata'lamunna naba-ahoo ba'da heen
translations.2: WalataAAlamunna nabaahu baAAda heenin
